original_text: Our enemies are like grapes full of poison. They are like grapes that have grown in the fields of Sodom and Gomorrah. 32: The people of Sodom and Gomorrah did wicked things. God punished them and he destroyed the cities. See Genesis 19:24-25. Our enemies are like grapes full of poison. korean_text: 이는 그들의 포도나무는 소돔의 포도나무요 고모라의 밭의 소산이라 그들의 포도는 독이 든 포도이니 그 송이는 쓰며

sentences.original_text: that have grown in the fields
The people of Sodom and Gomorrah
